law.catch_line: Appropriation of land for junior college.
law.text: The board of education of any city that has established or acquired a municipal junior college pursuant to KRS 165.210 may set apart or appropriate any site or school building, or part of a school building and grounds, not needed for general school purposes, for the use of a municipal junior college.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 241, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3219-13.
